title: MyVicePal
summary: Track your drinking, know your blood alcohol content (BAC), and lose weight.
description: MyVicePal makes it easy to track your drinking, BAC and lose weight. Simply add each drink you have with our easy and beautiful app and we'll show you your estimate blood alcohol content (BAC) level and how many calories you're consuming. You'll get a notifications to watch your BAC throughout the evening so you can maintain your best BAC level. Then you can see view your drinking habits over time via our daily, weekly and monthly reports. The more you use the app, the better you'll understand your habits. You can even share your BAC level with your friends too. MyVicePal was created because we wanted to be able to see how much we were drinking over time and to see if, through technology, we could control our drinking habits in a positive way (less binging, more fun, less regrets).“This sure is the best way to manage my drinking habits, cheers to that!”“Cant really think of a better way to keep track of those empty calories.”
descriptionHTML:
MyVicePal makes it easy to track your drinking, BAC and lose weight. Simply add each drink you have with our easy and beautiful app and we'll show you your estimate blood alcohol content (BAC) level and how many calories you're consuming. You'll get a notifications to watch your BAC throughout the evening so you can maintain your best BAC level. Then you can see view your drinking habits over time via our daily, weekly and monthly reports. The more you use the app, the better you'll understand your habits. You can even share your BAC level with your friends too.

MyVicePal was created because we wanted to be able to see how much we were drinking over time and to see if, through technology, we could control our drinking habits in a positive way (less binging, more fun, less regrets).

“This sure is the best way to manage my drinking habits, cheers to that!”

“Cant really think of a better way to keep track of those empty calories.”
comments: Cool idea, but mediocre execution and CRAZY expensive subscription This is a great idea for an app, and it's done reasonably well, but the subscription is insane. They're not providing a service, they're just unlocking a feature and *renting* it to you.  No thanks.  I might have been willing to pay a fair amount to unlock the perfect buzz feature permanently, maybe 5 to 10 bucks, and that's a princely sum for an app that has to do so little.

Great idea but... On my Lg Watch r, in unable to edit the drink details. It just said "Failed!". Also, it takes some time to drink a drink so should I add the drink on ordering or on completion? I love the idea, looking forward to using it more but if you can help with my feedback that would be great.

Neat App Just downloaded it today to play with it a little. I have a Moto 360 and it's nice integration so you don't need to pull out your phone to enter drinks in case your phone isn't right there. The one thing I don't see that I'm able to do is see my BAC on the watch itself. I can enter drinks but if I want to see my BAC and time graph I need to pull out my phone. I don't know how difficult it would be to implement this but being able to see this info on a small watch screen instead of my phone would be a little more "discreet." Overall great app and I could see this helping to know when to say "no thanks" to the next round at happy hour! 4 stars now would make 5 if the additional data was on the watch.

Possibilities!!!!! Nice idea.  I have a moto 360 and I would love to see bac level on watch.  Also heart rate would be cool too.  See how the alcohol effects the heart would also play in to a more accurate bac count.  Maybe a motion detection on a per drink basis calculating sips per drink.  So much potential for this app.  Keep it coming.
Error Keeps telling me I need google play services installed, which I do.
Worthless. Doesn't work anymore. After reinstall, can't log in.
recentChanges: Maintain the Perfect Buzz™!  The Perfect Buzz feature is now available! Perfect Buzz will let you know when it's time to have another drink to help you maintain control. Just set the BAC range you feel most comfortable with, add your drinks as you normally do and you'll be notified on your watch or phone when it's ok to have your next one so you don't have to calculate it on your own.
